metadata.title: CVE-2024-44309 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - high
metadata.description: A cookie management issue was addressed with improved state management.This issue is fixed in Safari 18.1.1, iOS 17.7.2 and iPadOS 17.7.2, macOSSequoia 15.1.1, iOS 18.1.1 and iPadOS 18.1.1, visionOS 2.1.1. Processingmaliciously crafted web content may lead to a cross site scripting attack.Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploitedon Intel-based Mac systems.

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
wpewebkit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
